Class NodeStateManager

java.lang.Object
ija.ijaProject.game.levels.NodeStateManager
public class NodeStateManager extends Object
Manages the saving and loading of node states for game levels. This allows the game to remember the state of nodes (position, rotation) when a player exits a level and returns to it later.
